message.no-event: We don't have an event planned right now; check back later.

assistance.heading: Do your students need assistance to attend CodeDay?
assistance.intro: As a worldwide non-profit, we believe there's a place in tech for everyone, no matter their financial means.
assistance.ticket: Free admission to the event, including food and drinks.
assistance.ride: Free Uber ride to and from the event. (No Uber account needed.)
assistance.laptop: A free laptop, theirs to keep if they make something at CodeDay. Yes, this is real, we've given out 500+ laptops already.
assistance.action: Fill out the form below, and we will provide you with a promo code to share with your students, as well as double-check our final roster to make sure all the listed students have requested assiatance.

apply.name: Teacher Name
apply.no-student: Please use your school email. (You must be a teacher to fill out this form! If you are a student, please send this form to a teacher.)
apply.student-names: Names of Students You Expect to Attend
apply.validate: Our team will validate your teacher status.
apply.promo-code: We will generate a promo code to share with students.
apply.double-check: We will double-check to make sure all these students requested the assistance they need.
apply.questions: If you have any questions, you can email us at <click>schools@codeday.org</click>.
apply.error: Your request could not be submitted. Try again, or email your request to schools@codeday.org.
